content: I want to look at files on my onedrive

Here are the 10 most-recent OneDrive items in your “Documents” folder.
If any interests you, just tell me the name (or the number) and what you’d like to do next (preview, download, summarise, etc.).

1. Voting Guide.docx (17 KB, modified 3 May 2025)
2. Gemini 2.5 deep research analysis of Ikirōne dreaming.docx (33 KB, 14 Apr 2025)
3. NCAT Training Manual.docx (42 KB, 10 Apr 2025)
4. Document.docx (18 KB, 3 Apr 2025)
5. Notice of Appeal.pdf (92 KB, 22 Mar 2025)
6. Notice of Appeal.docx (21 KB, 22 Mar 2025)
7. Appeal.docx (21 KB, 22 Mar 2025; first created Jun 2018)
8. Voice captures (folder, created 26 Jan 2025, 2 items)
9. Nathan @ Work (OneNote notebook, 23 MB, updated 22 Jan 2025)
10. Organ Family (OneNote notebook, 655 MB, updated 21 Jan 2025)

Let me know which file or folder you’d like to open or work with!
what are the 5 most recently worked on files?

Here are the five files you most recently edited or saved on OneDrive:  

1. Voting Guide.docx – modified 3 May 2025  
2. Gemini 2.5 deep research analysis of Ikirōne dreaming.docx – modified 14 Apr 2025  
3. NCAT Training Manual.docx – modified 10 Apr 2025  
4. Document.docx – modified 3 Apr 2025  
5. Notice of Appeal.pdf – modified 22 Mar 2025  

Let me know if you’d like to open, preview, download, summarise, or do anything else with any of these files.
Can you find my book Conquest of the Impossible?

I just checked the 50 most-recent items in your OneDrive and nothing named “Conquest of the Impossible” (or anything with “Conquest” in the title) showed up.

It’s probably an older file or in a less-recently-modified folder. A couple of ways I can help next:

• Look deeper: I can search a larger slice of your OneDrive or build a quick index of all your files and scan it for that title.  
• Narrow the hunt: If you remember roughly what type of file it is (Word, PDF, EPUB, etc.) or the folder it lives in, tell me and I’ll jump straight there.

Let me know how you’d like to proceed!
Let's build an index of my onedrive files

All set—I just indexed 239 items from your OneDrive, so I can now search everything instantly.

Go ahead and ask for any filename, keyword, author, or date range. For example:
• “Find ‘Conquest of the Impossible’ ”
• “Show every PDF created in 2022”
• “Search for files that mention ‘Ikirōne’ inside the text”

What would you like to look for first?
